item.description:
Last Minute Snowshoe and Hike @ Roger’s House

It’s supposed to snow a ton tonight and I have 25 acres behind my house with a few trails down to the water and marshlands…. and there is an Audubon property right down the street from me.

Snowshoes Optional. If you have them great – if not wear big boots and then follow the snowshoers.

Afterwards we can come back to my house for hot chocolate, hot toddies & Bonfire !!

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Last Minute Snowshoe and Hike @ Roger’s House
